statements: DELETE FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 123 AND interaction_type = 'purchase';
DELETE FROM customer_interactions WHERE email_address = 'john.doe@example.com' AND interaction_type = 'login';
DELETE FROM customer_emails WHERE customer_id = 123 AND interaction_type = 'newsletter';
DELETE FROM email_engagement WHERE email_id = 456 AND open_count > 100;
DELETE FROM customer_emails WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM email_engagement WHERE click_count >= 50);
DELETE FROM email_engagement WHERE engagement_type = 'clicked' AND engagement_date < '2022-02-01';
DELETE FROM marketing_emails WHERE send_date < NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days';
DELETE FROM Customer_Interactions WHERE interaction_type='email' AND interaction_date < '2021-10-01';
DELETE FROM Email_Responses WHERE response_type='out_of_office' AND response_date < '2021-09-15';
DELETE FROM Email_Clicks WHERE click_type='link' AND click_date < '2021-08-20';
